A micro-disassembler, for use in the DumpClass disassembly step

inst
A list of instructions, including the mnemonics, opcodes, and the format of the bytecode arguments.
ops
Array of instructions, indexed by opcode.

makeUnsignedInt(int, int)
Takes a high byte and a low byte and returns the value of the 2-byte unsigned int number
